title: idk
body: Ever since the new honour update it only shows one of my ranks for solo/due and flex and 3v3 but it only shows my worst one not my B1solo due is shows b5 for flex why?

replies.body: I want to help you out here, but I'm really confused about your issue.  Clarify what's going on exactly with some more specifics, and I'll try to clear things up.

When i click my "profile", it shows me B5 in the corner but if i place my curser over the Bronze 5 icon. 3 sections pop up,
 First says: Bronze 5 ranked flex
Second says(iN THE middle): Bronze 2 Rakned solo/duo
third says: unranked 3v3
Why does it display my bronze 5 Flex instead of displaying my Bronze 2 ranked solo/duo
